page.title: 14Language. Gaelic.
page.content: A lot of people speak Gaelic in Kyleakin 10% of the people are fluent Gaelic speakers. The Mod is a competition for Children which is usually held in June every year.The Mod is when children take part in Gaelic songs,poems and readings.Gaelic can be a very difficult language to learn. In our primary school a Gaelic teacher comes to teach us.No one can speak fluent Gaelic yet but most people enjoy it.It is a very intresting language and some people on the island do not speak any English at all only Gaelic.Here is a Gaelic sentence { {Failte do'n Eilean Sgianthanach ! } Welcome to the Isle of Skye !
